txt.en: There are many rewards that await those who participate in the Anniversary Festival, and for those that celebrate for many days, the rewards are all the grander!
'You've proved you mean business, friend! But can you keep up that festival spirit? Three more days to go!'
Every day there is something to do during the Anniversary Festival.  Come and join everyone and participate in many Anniversary Festival activities for three more days!

'Nine days of celebrating another lovely year, goodness me!

Waldo Rumble hands you a large reward.

'You've given us all so much, my friend!'
Every day there is something to do during the Anniversary Festival.  Come and join everyone and participate in many Anniversary Festival activities for three more days!
Waldo Rumble would like to thank you for your continued participation in the Anniversary Festival.
Every year in the spring, the Anniversary Festival takes place to celebrate a very special occasion. Partake in the festivities to help mark this milestone with fireworks and good-cheer!
